name: Chris Duffin
bio: Chris Duffin is a strength athlete, coach, and engineer, setting multiple strength world records including squatting and deadlifting 1000 lbs for multiple reps

name: Jason Calacanis
bio: Jason Calacanis is an angel investor, entrepreneur, and co-host of All-In Podcast and This Week in Startups

name: David Fravor
bio: David Fravor is a navy pilot of 18 years and a primary witness in one of the most credible UFO sightings in history

name: Cristos Goodrow
bio: Cristos Goodrow is VP of Engineering at Google and head of Search and Discovery at YouTube (aka YouTube Algorithm)

name: Ryan Hall
bio: Ryan Hall is a martial artist, BJJ black belt, and MMA fighter undefeated in the UFC

name: Michael Malice
bio: Michael Malice is a political thinker, podcaster, and author

name: Cal Newport
bio: Cal Newport is a computer scientist who also writes about productivity

name: Josh Barnett
bio: Josh Barnett is an MMA fighter, catch wrestler, and a scholar of violence

name: Anca Dragan
bio: Anca Dragan is a professor at Berkeley, working on human-robot interaction -- algorithms that look beyond the robot's function in isolation, and generate robot behavior that accounts for interaction and coordination with human beings

name: Wojciech Zaremba
bio: Wojciech Zaremba is a co-founder of OpenAI

name: Jordan Ellenberg
bio: Jordan Ellenberg is a mathematician and author of Shape and How Not to Be Wrong

name: Ryan Schiller
bio: Ryan Schiller is the creator of Librex, an anonymous discussion feed for college communities

name: Max Tegmark
bio: Max Tegmark is a physicist and AI researcher at MIT

name: David Silver
bio: David Silver leads the reinforcement learning research group at DeepMind and was lead researcher on AlphaGo, AlphaZero and co-lead on AlphaStar, and MuZero and lot of important work in reinforcement learning

name: Karl Friston
bio: Karl Friston is one of the greatest neuroscientists in history, cited over 245,000 times, known for many influential ideas in brain imaging, neuroscience, and theoretical neurobiology, including the fascinating idea of the free-energy principle for action and perception

name: Ilya Sutskever
bio: Ilya Sutskever is the co-founder of OpenAI, is one of the most cited computer scientist in history with over 165,000 citations, and to me, is one of the most brilliant and insightful minds ever in the field of deep learning

name: Manolis Kellis
bio: Manolis Kellis is a computational biologist at MIT

name: Richard Dawkins
bio: Richard Dawkins is an evolutionary biologist, and author of The Selfish Gene, The Blind Watchmaker, The God Delusion, The Magic of Reality, The Greatest Show on Earth, and his latest Outgrowing God

name: Grant Sanderson
bio: Grant Sanderson is the creator of 3Blue1Brown

name: David Patterson
bio: David Patterson is a Turing award winner and professor of computer science at Berkeley

name: Saagar Enjeti
bio: Saagar Enjeti is a DC-based political correspondent and podcaster

name: Steven Pressfield
bio: Steven Pressfield is a historian and author of War of Art, a book that had a big impact on my life and the life of millions of whose passion is to create in art, science, business, sport, and everywhere else

name: Sean Kelly
bio: Sean Kelly is a philosopher at Harvard specializing in existentialism and the philosophy of mind

name: Sergey Levine
bio: Sergey Levine is a professor at Berkeley and a world-class researcher in deep learning, reinforcement learning, robotics, and computer vision, including the development of algorithms for end-to-end training of neural network policies that combine perception and control, scalable algorithms for inverse reinforcement learning, and deep RL algorithms

name: Jeff Hawkins
bio: Jeff Hawkins is a neuroscientist and cofounder of Numenta, a neuroscience research company

name: Bret Weinstein
bio: Bret Weinstein is and evolutionary biologist, author, and co-host of the DarkHorse Podcast

name: Lisa Feldman Barrett
bio: Lisa Feldman Barrett is a neuroscientist, psychologist, and author

name: Jaron Lanier
bio: Jaron Lanier is a computer scientist, composer, artist, author, and founder of the field of virtual reality

name: Daphne Koller
bio: Daphne Koller is a professor of computer science at Stanford University, a co-founder of Coursera with Andrew Ng and Founder and CEO of insitro, a company at the intersection of machine learning and biomedicine

name: Peter Singer
bio: Peter Singer is a professor of bioethics at Princeton, best known for his 1975 book Animal Liberation, that makes an ethical case against eating meat

name: Eric Weinstein
bio: Eric Weinstein is a mathematical physicist and podcaster

name: David Eagleman
bio: David Eagleman is a neuroscientist at Stanford

name: Donald Knuth
bio: Donald Knuth is a computer scientist, Turing Award winner, father of algorithm analysis, author of The Art of Computer Programming, and creator of TeX

name: David Chalmers
bio: David Chalmers is a philosopher and cognitive scientist specializing in philosophy of mind, philosophy of language, and consciousness

name: Joscha Bach
bio: Joscha Bach is a cognitive scientist, AI researcher, and philosopher

name: Anya Fernald
bio: Anya Fernald is the co-founder of Belcampo farms, chef, and regenerative agriculture expert

name: Bryan Johnson
bio: Bryan Johnson is the founder and CEO of Kernel, OS Fund, and previously Braintree

name: Sara Seager
bio: Sara Seager is a planetary scientist at MIT, known for her work on the search for exoplanets

name: Anthony Pompliano
bio: Anthony Pompliano is an entrepreneur, investor, writer, and podcaster on topics of decentralized finance

name: Clara Sousa
bio: Clara Sousa-Silva is a quantum astrochemist at Harvard

name: Ronald Sullivan
bio: Ronald Sullivan is a law professor at Harvard and previously a lawyer for Harvey Weinstein and Aaron Hernandez

name: Lex Fridman
bio:
Please support this podcast by checking out our sponsors:

name: Tyler Cowen
bio: Tyler Cowen is an economist, writer, and podcaster

name: Georges St
bio: Georges St-Pierre is a martial artist

name: Dawn Song
bio: Dawn Song is a professor of computer science at UC Berkeley with research interests in security, most recently with a focus on the intersection between computer security and machine learning

name: Vincent Racaniello
bio: Vincent Racaniello is a virologist, immunologist, and microbiologist at Columbia

name: Stephen Schwarzman
bio: Stephen Schwarzman is the CEO and Co-Founder of Blackstone, one of the world's leading investment firms with over 530 billion dollars of assets under management

name: Frank Wilczek
bio: Frank Wilczek is a Nobel Prize winning physicist at MIT

name: Lee Smolin
bio: Lee Smolin is a theoretical physicist, co-inventor of loop quantum gravity, and a contributor of many interesting ideas to cosmology, quantum field theory, the foundations of quantum mechanics, theoretical biology, and the philosophy of science

name: Paul Krugman
bio: Paul Krugman is a Nobel Prize winner in economics, professor at CUNY, and columnist at the New York Times

name: Roger Penrose
bio: Roger Penrose is physicist, mathematician, and philosopher at University of Oxford

name: Jo Boaler
bio: Jo Boaler is a professor of mathematics education at Stanford and the co-founder of youcubed

name: Michael Malice
bio: Michael Malice is a political thinker, podcaster, and author

name: Travis Oliphant
bio: Travis Oliphant is a data scientist, entrepreneur, and creator of NumPy, SciPy, and Anaconda

name: Russ Tedrake
bio: Russ Tedrake is a roboticist and professor at MIT and vice president of robotics research at TRI

name: Alexander Fridman
bio: Alexander Fridman is a professor at Drexel University and the director of the Nyheim Plasma Institute

name: Brian Kernighan
bio: Brian Kernighan is a professor of computer science at Princeton University

name: Diana Walsh Pasulka
bio: Diana Walsh Pasulka is a professor of philosophy and religion at UNCW and author of American Cosmic: UFOs, Religion, and Technology

name: Brian Muraresku
bio: Brian Muraresku is the author of The Immortality Key

name: John Hopfield
bio: John Hopfield is professor at Princeton, whose life's work weaved beautifully through biology, chemistry, neuroscience, and physics

name: RZA
bio: RZA is a rapper, record producer, filmmaker, actor, writer, philosopher, and the mastermind of the legendary hip hop group Wu-Tang Clan

name: Dmitri Dolgov
bio: Dmitri Dolgov is the CTO of Waymo, an autonomous vehicle company

name: Michael Malice
bio: Michael Malice is a political thinker, podcaster, and author

name: Eric Weinstein
bio: Eric Weinstein is a mathematician with a bold and piercing intelligence, unafraid to explore the biggest questions in the universe and shine a light on the darkest corners of our society

name: Scott Aaronson
bio: Scott Aaronson is a professor at UT Austin, director of its Quantum Information Center, and previously a professor at MIT

name: Barry Barish
bio: Barry Barish is a theoretical physicist at Caltech and the winner of the Nobel Prize in Physics

name: Jay McClelland
bio: Jay McClelland is a cognitive scientist at Stanford

name: Vladimir Vapnik
bio: Vladimir Vapnik is the co-inventor of support vector machines, support vector clustering, VC theory, and many foundational ideas in statistical learning

name: Avi Loeb
bio: Avi Loeb is an astrophysicist at Harvard

name: Dan Kokotov
bio: Dan Kokotov is VP of Engineering at Rev

name: Brendan Eich
bio: Brendan Eich is the creator of JavaScript and co-founder of Mozilla and Brave

name: Simon Sinek
bio: Simon Sinek is an author of several books including Start With Why, Leaders Eat Last, and his latest The Infinite Game

name: Dmitry Korkin
bio: Dmitry Korkin is a professor of bioinformatics and computational biology at Worcester Polytechnic Institute, where he specializes in bioinformatics of complex disease, computational genomics, systems biology, and biomedical data analytics

name: Alex Garland
bio: Alex Garland, writer and director of many imaginative and philosophical films from the dreamlike exploration of human self-destruction in the movie Annihilation to the deep questions of consciousness and intelligence raised in the movie Ex Machina, which to me is one of the greatest movies on artificial intelligence ever made

name: Natalya Bailey
bio: Natalya Bailey is a rocket propulsion engineer from MIT and now CTO of Accion Systems

name: Zev Weinstein
bio: Zev Weinstein is a young man who thinks deeply about the world

name: Michael Littman
bio: Michael Littman is a computer scientist at Brown University

name: Vitalik Buterin
bio: Vitalik Buterin is the co-founder of Ethereum

name: Jed Buchwald
bio: Jed Buchwald is a historian and philosopher of science at Caltech

name: Dan Gable
bio: Dan Gable is one of the greatest Olympic athletes and wrestling coaches of all time

name: John Danaher
bio: John Danaher is a coach, scholar, and educator of jiu jitsu, submission grappling, judo, MMA, and the martial arts

name: William MacAskill
bio: William MacAskill is a philosopher, ethicist, and one of the originators of the effective altruism movement

name: John Clarke
bio: John Clarke is a BJJ black belt and MMA coach

name: Dileep George
bio: Dileep George is a researcher at the intersection of neuroscience and artificial intelligence, co-founder of Vicarious, formerly co-founder of Numenta

name: Joe Rogan
bio: Joe Rogan is a comedian, UFC commentator, and the host of the Joe Rogan Experience

name: Katherine de Kleer
bio: Katherine de Kleer is a professor of Planetary Science and Astronomy at Caltech

name: Scott Aaronson
bio: Scott Aaronson is a quantum computer scientist

name: Fran
bio: Fran√ßois Chollet is an AI researcher at Google and creator of Keras

name: Andrew Ng
bio: Andrew Ng is one of the most impactful educators, researchers, innovators, and leaders in artificial intelligence and technology space in general

name: Charles Isbell and Michael Littman
bio: Charles Isbell is the Dean of the College of Computing at Georgia Tech

name: Stephen Wolfram
bio: Stephen Wolfram is a computer scientist, mathematician, and theoretical physicist who is the founder and CEO of Wolfram Research, a company behind Mathematica, Wolfram Alpha, Wolfram Language, and the new Wolfram Physics project

name: Silvio Micali
bio: Silvio Micali is a computer scientist at MIT, Turing award winner, and founder of Algorand

name: Ryan Hall
bio: Ryan Hall is a jiu jitsu black belt, UFC fighter, and a philosopher of the martial arts

name: Rodney Brooks
bio: Rodney Brooks is a roboticist, former head of CSAIL at MIT, and co-founder of iRobot, Rethink Robotics, and Robust

bio: Sheldon Solomon is a social psychologist, a philosopher, co-developer of Terror Management Theory, co-author of The Worm at the Core

name: Manolis Kellis
bio: Manolis Kellis is a computational biologist at MIT

name: Cumrun Vafa
bio: Cumrun Vafa is a theoretical physicist at Harvard

name: Matthew Johnson
bio: Matthew W

name: Richard Craib
bio: Richard Craib is the founder of Numerai, a crowd-sourced, AI-run stock trading system

name: Jitendra Malik
bio: Jitendra Malik is a professor at Berkeley and one of the seminal figures in the field of computer vision, the kind before the deep learning revolution, and the kind after

name: Jim Keller
bio: Jim Keller is a legendary microprocessor engineer, having worked at AMD, Apple, Tesla, and now Intel

name: Robert Langer
bio: Robert Langer is a professor at MIT and one of the most cited researchers in history, specializing in biotechnology fields of drug delivery systems and tissue engineering

name: David Sinclair
bio: David Sinclair is a geneticist at Harvard and author of Lifespan

name: Jack Dorsey
bio: Jack Dorsey is the co-founder and CEO of Twitter and the founder and CEO of Square

bio: Luis and Joao Batalha are co-founders of Fermat's Library

name: Jim Keller
bio: Jim Keller is a legendary microprocessor engineer, previously at AMD, Apple, Tesla, Intel, and now Tenstorrent

bio: Richard Karp is a professor at Berkeley and one of the key figures in the history of theoretical computer science

name: Michael Mina
bio: Michael Mina is an immunologist, epidemiologist, and physician at Harvard

name: Konstantin Batygin
bio: Konstantin Batygin is a planetary astrophysicist at Caltech

name: Jocko Willink
bio: Jocko Willink is a retired Navy SEAL, co-author of Extreme Ownership, and host of Jocko Podcast

name: Ayanna Howard
bio: Ayanna Howard is a roboticist and professor at Georgia Tech, director of Human-Automation Systems lab, with research interests in human-robot interaction, assistive robots in the home, therapy gaming apps, and remote robotic exploration of extreme environments

name: Dan Carlin
bio: Dan Carlin is a historian, political thinker, and podcaster

name: Douglas Lenat
bio: Douglas Lenat is the founder of Cyc, a 37 year project aiming to solve common-sense knowledge and reasoning in AI

name: Po
bio: Po-Shen Loh is a mathematician at CMU and coach of the USA International Math Olympiad team

name: Travis Stevens
bio: Travis Stevens is the 2016 Olympic Judo silver medalist and BJJ black belt

name: Harry Cliff
bio: Harry Cliff is a particle physicist at the University of Cambridge working on the Large Hadron Collider beauty experiment that specializes in searching for hints of new particles and forces by studying a type of particle called the "beauty quark", or "b quark"

name: Nick Bostrom
bio: Nick Bostrom is a philosopher at University of Oxford and the director of the Future of Humanity Institute

name: Sara Walker
bio: Sara Walker is an astrobiologist and theoretical physicist interested in the origin of life

bio: Eric Weinstein is a mathematical physicist, podcaster, and intellectual

bio: Manolis Kellis is a professor at MIT and head of the MIT Computational Biology Group

name: James Gosling
bio: James Gosling is the founder and lead designer of the Java programming language

bio: Rob Reid is an author and podcaster

bio: Rick Doblin is a psychedelics researcher and the founder and executive director of the Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies (MAPS)

name: Jeremi Suri
bio: Jeremi Suri is a historian at UT Austin

name: Tim Dillon
bio: Tim Dillon is a comedian and podcaster

name: Manolis Kellis
bio: Manolis Kellis is a professor at MIT and head of the MIT Computational Biology Group

bio: Richard Wrangham is a biological anthropologist at Harvard, specializing in the study of primates and the evolution of violence, sex, cooking, culture, and other aspects of ape and human behavior

name: Yeonmi Park
bio: Yeonmi Park is a North Korean defector, human rights activist, and author of the book In Order to Live

name: Sertac Karaman
bio: Sertac Karaman is a professor at MIT, co-founder of the autonomous vehicle company Optimus Ride, and is one of top roboticists in the world, including robots that drive and robots that fly

name: Vitalik Buterin
bio: Vitalik Buterin is co-creator of Ethereum and ether, which is a cryptocurrency that is currently the second-largest digital currency after bitcoin

name: Kate Darling
bio: Kate Darling is a researcher at MIT, interested in social robotics, robot ethics, and generally how technology intersects with society

name: Risto Miikkulainen
bio: Risto Miikkulainen is a computer scientist at UT Austin

name: Yannis Pappas
bio: Yannis Pappas is a comedian and podcaster

name: Niels Jorgensen
bio: Niels Jorgensen is a former New York firefighter for over 21 years, who was there at Ground Zero on September 11th, 2001

name: Joscha Bach
bio: Joscha Bach is the VP of Research at the AI Foundation, previously doing research at MIT and Harvard

name: Daniel Schmachtenberger
bio: Daniel Schmachtenberger is a philosopher and founding member of The Consilience Project

name: Dmitry Korkin
bio: Dmitry Korkin is a professor of bioinformatics and computational biology at WPI

name: Matt Walker
bio: Matt Walker is a sleep scientist at Berkeley, author of Why We Sleep, and the host of a new podcast called The Matt Walker Podcast

name: Nic Carter
bio: Nic Carter is a financial researcher, investor, writer, and podcaster on topics of decentralized finance

bio: Sam Harris is an author, podcaster, and philosopher

bio: Andrew Huberman is a neuroscientist at Stanford

name: Zach Bitter
bio: Zach Bitter is an ultramarathon runner and coach

name: Marcus Hutter
bio: Marcus Hutter is a senior research scientist at DeepMind and professor at Australian National University

name: Michael I. Jordan
bio: Michael I Jordan is a professor at Berkeley, and one of the most influential people in the history of machine learning, statistics, and artificial intelligence

name: Roger Reaves
bio: Roger Reaves is one of the most prolific drug smugglers in history

name: George Hotz
bio: George Hotz (geohot) is a programmer, hacker, and the founder of Comma

name: Ann Druyan
bio: Ann Druyan is the writer, producer, director, and one of the most important and impactful communicators of science in our time

name: Sergey Nazarov
bio: Sergey Nazarov is the Co-Founder of Chainlink, a decentralized oracle network that provides data to smart contracts

bio: Eugenia Kuyda co-founder of Replika, an AI companion
